mapper.select: select b.bnum, b.category, b.region, b.unum, b.id, b.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as createdate, b.title, b.content, b.view_cnt, b.recommend, b.isdelete, b.isreport, b.isopen, COUNT(r.rnum) AS replyCnt from bbs b left join bbsreply r on b.bnum = r.bnum AND r.isdelete = 'N' where b.isdelete = 'N' and b.bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update bbs set view_cnt = view_cnt+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
update bbs set recommend = recommend+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.delete: update bbs set isdelete='Y' where bnum=#{bnum} and unum=#{unum}
